Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner & Division, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Division, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Grand
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Grand. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Grand. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
